abstract: Many gay retirement communities around the country, once hailed as havens for an aging population that may lack family support or experience discrimination, have either failed to open or fallen victim to a weakened housing market or a deflated economy.
snippet: Many gay retirement communities around the country, once hailed as havens for the aging Stonewall generation, have either failed to open or fallen on hard times.
lead_paragraph: Many gay retirement communities around the country, once hailed as havens for the aging Stonewall generation, have either failed to open or fallen on hard times.

headline.main: Hard Times for Gay Retirement Havens
headline.print_headline: Hard Times for Gay Retirement Havens
headline.seo: Gay Retirement Communities Struggling in the Recession
